ActorTalk: A gift box appears, stuffed with colorful origami clovers. A folded note rests gently on top.
Oh... Froggie... seems to be waking up.
Froggie, thank you for helping everyone in our town make their wishes come true.
We know you've been asking about our wishes because you want to grow a Miracle Clover. But what's written in the old bark scrolls is just a legend. No one knows if it will really work...
But no matter what, everyone in Clover Town is part of one family. Whether the clover blooms or not, we just want you to be happy.
Your kindness to all of us is already the greatest miracle this town could ask for.
So... each of us folded an origami clover by hand and gathered them together as a gift.
This is a treasure filled with the heartfelt wishes of everyone in Clover Town. We hope it can help you...
Ribbit?! Th-this is... the Miracle Clover!
So this is how the original film ends...
Oh! Looks like the story's over. Shall we head back?
